property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: each player chooses and kneels one of his or her standing characters, if able. The player who knelt the character with the highest STR claims 2 power for his or her house. The player that triggers this event must kneel his character first.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only.Response: after an opponent plays a non-Limited location from his or her hand, kneel X influence to take control of that location. X is the printed cost of that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only.Challenges: kneel 1 influence to stand any number of kneeling Knight characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only.Dominance: kneel 1 influence to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR where X is equal to that character's printed STR. Any opponent may kneel 1 influence to cancel this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only.Dominance: kneel X influence to choose X cards in play (characters or locations). They do not stand during the standing phase this round. Any opponent may kneel X influence to cancel this effect

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only.Dominance: kneel 2 influence to claim 3 power for your house. Any opponent may kneel 2 influence to cancel this effect

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only.Dominance: kneel 3 influence to choose and discard a location from play (cannot be saved). Any opponent may kneel 1 influence to cancel this effect

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only.Dominance: kneel 2 influence to choose and kill a non-Stark character. Any opponent may kneel 2 influence to cancel this effect

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only.Challenges: choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an intrigue icon. If that character is a Knight, it also gains stealth and renown

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only.Challenges: kneel 3 influence to choose an opponent and a challenge type. That opponent may initiate one fewer of that challenge type this phase.

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you declare a single character as an attacker, give the current challenge the Jousting challenge trait. Players may only declare 1 defender during a Jousting challenge

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only.Response: after a Knight character is put into play, kneel 2 influence to discard that character from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: cancel the effects of a Story Event card just played

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: save an attachment from being discarded from play. Then, you may return that attachment and all attachments with the same name in your discard pile to their owner's hands

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel X influence to choose X attacking or defending Knight characters. Until the end of the phase, each chosen character gets +X STR

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a challenge in which there are at least 4 or more participating characters. Challenges: give the current challenge the Melee challenge trait. Raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 for the duration of the challenge. Limit 1 per challenge

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a character with at least 1 attachment is killed or discarded from play, search your deck and/or discard pile for up to 2 Weapon cards and attach them to an eligible character. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only.Challenges: choose and stand or kneel a character with at least 1 power

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot play Queen of Love and Beauty unless you have more Story Event cards in your discard pile than any one opponent.Response: play after you win a Jousting challenge. Search your deck for a Lady character and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only.Play only during a Jousting or Melee challenge.Challenges: kneel 1 influence to remove all challenge traits from the current challenge. The current challenge then becomes an intrigue challenge instead

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only.Any Phase: kneel 3 influence to choose a Knight or Army character in your discard or dead pile. Put that character into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only.Dominance: kneel 2 influence to treat all characters as though their text boxes were blank and as though they had zero attachments until the end of the phase

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only.Marshalling: until the end of the phase, each Warship location you control gains 'Marshalling: kneel this card to lower the cost of the next card you play this phase by 1.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel X influence to search your deck for any number of Tourney Ground cards with combined printed cost X or lower and put those cards into play. Then shuffle your deck

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot play Trial by Battle unless you have at least 3 Story Event cards in your discard pile.Challenges: play during an intrigue or a power challenge. Remove all participating characters who do not have a military icon from the challenge

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only.Dominance: kneel 3 influence to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck, then put them into your hand. Any opponent may kneel 3 influence to cancel this effect

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only.Response: after you declare 2 or more attackers each with at least one attachment, kneel 1 influence to choose an opponent. That opponent cannot declare defenders or trigger card effects for the duration of the challenge

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only.Response: after you lose a challenge as defender, kneel 2 influence to choose and discard an attacking character from play (cannot be saved). Then, search the deck and hand of that character's controller for any copy of that character and discard it. Then, shuffle the deck

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kill a Kingsguard character you control (cannot be saved) to choose a Lord or Lady character in your dead pile or discard pile. Then, put that character in play

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise your claim value by 2 for the duration of Jousting or Melee challenges

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and discard from play a card whose House affiliation does not match that of its controller's House (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: If you choose to declare attackers or defenders, you cannot declare fewer than 2 attackers or defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose each opponent that did not reveal The Art of Seduction as his or her plot card. Those opponents cannot reveal a new plot card during the plot phase next round

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, you may choose and kneel 2 Knight characters each controlled by a different player. Discard from play the knelt character with the lowest STR

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents who control fewer Knight characters than you draw 2 fewer cards during the draw phase

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control more Knight characters than each other player, draw an additional card during the draw phase.While you control fewer Knight characters than at least one other player, draw 1 fewer card during the draw phase

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control 4 or more Kingsguard characters, you need 3 fewer power to win the game.While you control fewer than 4 Kingsguard characters, you need 3 more power to win the game.
